name: CrushMan Supreme Gold Edition
description:
This best original fighter game. Many Character choice Bario and Donkey Man. Play Mexican Plumbing friends or Capitalist Donkey. Choice is you!

CONTROLS PLAYER 1

up, left, right - movement

g - shield

h - punch

j -special

---

CONTROLS PLAYER 2

w,a,d - movement

b - shield

n - punch

m -special

---

FIGHT FOR DESTINY!
